definition: to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent

sentences.english: The yellow fever vaccine used must be approved by WHO.
sentences.chinese: 使用的黃熱病疫苗必須經世衛組織批准。

sentences.english: WHO is the Secretariat for the International Coordinating Group for Yellow Fever Vaccine Provision (ICG).
sentences.chinese: 世衛組織擔當黃熱病疫苗供應國際協調小組的祕書處。

sentences.english: Yellow fever is difficult to diagnose, especially during the early stages.
sentences.chinese: 黃熱病很難診斷，尤其是在病程初期。

sentences.english: Yellow fever was sharply curtailed after the Civil War and was finally eradicated by 1906.
sentences.chinese: 黃熱病在內戰後大幅減少，並於1906年消除。

sentences.english: Blood tests can detect yellow fever antibodies produced in response to the infection.
sentences.chinese: 驗血可檢測出因感染產生的黃熱病抗體。

sentences.english: The health district of Buea was not previously known to be a yellow fever endemic area.
sentences.chinese: 以往並不清楚布埃亞衛生區屬於黃熱病流行地帶。

sentences.english: The viruses are being transmitted largely by the yellow fever mosquito, Aedes aegypti.
sentences.chinese: 這些病毒主要是由感染黃熱病的伊蚊傳播。

sentences.english: The index case was identified through routine yellow fever surveillance system.
sentences.chinese: 指示病例是通過常規黃熱病監測系統發現的。

sentences.english: She had no history of yellow fever vaccination and survived.
sentences.chinese: 患者沒有黃熱病疫苗的接種史，並隨後存活。

sentences.english: The case has been laboratory confirmed for Yellow fever by the Institut Pasteur, Dakar.
sentences.chinese: 達喀爾市巴斯德研究所實驗室確認了該起黃熱病病例。

sentences.english: Pictured above is a yellow fever quarantine station.
sentences.chinese: 以上圖片拍的是一個黃熱病檢疫站。

sentences.english: Yellow fever hit the nation's Southern- tates in epidemic proportions.
sentences.chinese: 黃熱病肆虐美國南部各州。

sentences.english: He had no history of yellow fever vaccination.
sentences.chinese: 病人沒有黃熱病疫苗接種史。

definition: World Health Organization (WHO)/abbr. for 世界衛生組織|世界卫生组织[Shi4 jie4 Wei4 sheng1 Zu3 zhi1]
